field_descriptions.name: Name of the parameter to vote for.
field_descriptions.value: Value of the parameter to vote for.
field_descriptions.commit: Commit a new value after voting has ended.
field_descriptions.withdraw: Withdraw a stake used for voting. Set to 1.
field_descriptions.amount: Amount to withdraw or amount of grant proposal (in T1 tokens).
field_descriptions.type: Type of proposal. Only 'grant' is supported.
field_descriptions.unit: Unit where the pledge of the proposed grant recipient is posted.
field_descriptions.expiry: When the proposal expires, YYYY-MM-DD format.
